website_summaries.verdict: Product ships with two packs of bubble wrap, making it easier to store.
pros: Gives you a high quality of bubble wrap with 3/16" thick bubbles
Protects fragile items especially well because of the quality of the materials
Contains perforations every 12" along the length of the roll, so you can select the perfect size of piece
Reusable and lasts a long time
cons: A little more expensive than some options when calculated per square foot

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly adequate just overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This popped up as a suggested item when I was purchasing 5/16th inch bubble wrap, which is what I thought this was. Of course, it’s printed clearly that this is not that in the product info, but that’s not why I’m giving it a three-star review. It gets a three star review because it costs twice as much as other brands of 3/16 bubble wrap and it’s the same stuff. So, it’s perfectly fine bubble wrap, it’s just overpriced for what it is. If it were 12” x 60” of 5/16 bubble wrap, it would be a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Bubble wrap.....
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bubble wrap. She has a habit of nibbling blankets when she gets stressed. One day she discovered bubble wrap and she's never chewed on another blanket. No lie, she'd choose bubble wrap over bacon. So, my dog gives this wrap 5 stars and highly recommends it for stress relief. 🤓
customer_reviews.author: Hippie Chick

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased more than one of these and it is well worth it, you cannot beat the deal of having two rolls of bubble wrap and two sheets of "fragile" stickers. The perforation can be hard to see or find at times, but scissors or tearing it by hand is not an issue. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Used these to pack some really sentimental cookie jars to put into storage for a few months while I buy a house. It doesn’t seem like a lot of bubble wrap but it was plenty to package three large cookie jars. Also, gave me leftovers for a wedding center piece and a few small breakables.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa  Sletten

customer_reviews.title: Fairly thin, you will need to use more to compensate
customer_reviews.text: On its face this seems like a good value compared to the more heavy duty brand name bubble wrap. However, I found myself having to wrap things three times around, where the more expensive wrap I was wrapping once or twice. Because you have to use more to compensate, I strongly prefer the heavyer duty stuff. On a positive note the Fragile stickers included were nice.
customer_reviews.author: Professor Ty Sanders, Esq.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It's bubble wrap, just like all the other bubble wrap. Very easy to tear at 12 inch intervals. Please make sure you dispose of it properly, and not in a landfill.
customer_reviews.author: denese

customer_reviews.title: Great bubble wrap
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bubble wrap for a decent price, much cheaper than the name brands. The perforation is a great addition, easy to use, and let's face it, why but more expensive brands when we'll just be throwing it away after. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice strong cushioning
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I sell items which need a lot of cushioning and this is excellent for that purpose. Not a bad price either for such strong bubble wrap.
customer_reviews.author: No nothing

customer_reviews.title: Meh, they are thin and tear easy
customer_reviews.text: They are bubble SHEETS rather than a "wrap" because the perforation tears very easy which makes it hard to wrap something. I am sure they work for some things like small figurines, but not for anything that is larger than one sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very small rolls
customer_reviews.text: This is the size of something you would send as a joke, the rolls are the size of bounty paper towel rolls by an inch or so and the two rolls are not going to cover much of anything. Seriously, not worth the money, I’d return them but also not worth the trouble although it appears to contain 60 12”x12” squares the rolls are meager due to the thin plastic and poorly inflated bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Clark E.

customer_reviews.title: cushions but rips easily
customer_reviews.text: The bubble wrap does its job in cushioning, but the perforated sections tear way too easily! Just by unraveling from the roll, the wrap separates by itself. A little annoying that it tears by itself.
customer_reviews.author: PNW Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Separates very easy, not good for wrapping
customer_reviews.text: This is super cheap, it pulls apart super easy which makes it hard to wrap a fragile item. I had other brands that worked better. This would be more suited for stuff a box as the sheets sepeeate too easily,
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1979

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Unlike presented. Ordered so I could wrap baby car seat for flight. The picture is totally wrong. Was small. Divided into small parts which fell apart (tore) when I tried wrapping the car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Blass

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very durable product. Rolls are convenient for storage and wrapping. Excellent price with fast dellivey
customer_reviews.author: Bridget O'C

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of others to choose from
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 different bundles of bubble wrap to aid in wrapping up art/picture frames for moving. This one was by far inferior is 2 ways. 1) The bubbles EASILY popped with the lightest of grabs and 2) the roll was super loose when un wraped, the perforations ripped too easily. There are much better rolls of bubble wrap out there for a couple (seriously 2$) bucks more. Move along from this one.
customer_reviews.author: CS Kent

customer_reviews.title: Wrap it up
customer_reviews.text: Using this to wrap toilet paper. Functions as 2 in 1 if the toilet paper goes...
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent material
customer_reviews.text: Since we were going overseas I needed this to protect all the moisturers and Xmas gifts. Not one item broke. Thank you. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Really came in handy after the holidays for wrapping & securing all those breakable treasures we accumulate. Delivery was fast. Would order again!
customer_reviews.author: dbann

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised, good quality bubble wrap at a good price. I normally buy the duck brand, but this stuff is just as good at a comparable price. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: The Righteous Priest

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. I ordered it last minute add it arrived by the next day. I used this to store glass dishes and bakeware. Super easy to tear off the size you need. Would definitely order again (and cheaper than Home Depot).
customer_reviews.author: Queenpep

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great!! I like the smaller bubbles...seems like you get more wrappage ability with various items.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Maggio

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Not much wrap for the money an the bubbles are very small.
customer_reviews.author: wjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Weak perforation between sheets. Hard to wrap.
customer_reviews.text: The perforations between sheets made it hard to wrap anything because they would just fall apart at the seams. This bubble wrap shouldn’t be used to wrap, but it would probably work good to place between plates since it rips apart too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Katk

customer_reviews.title: Say what!?
customer_reviews.text: The description states 16 "free" fragile stickers, the sticker ON the product delivered to me states 24 "free" fragile stickers. There was only one sheet of 8 stickers. If you're looking for a combo pack of bubble wrap and stickers...this was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Wood Leese

customer_reviews.title: Yup It's Bubble Wrap
customer_reviews.text: What can ya say, it's bubble wrap. Works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: sgtfury83

customer_reviews.title: NOT MUCH FOR THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: You don't get much and yes, I DID read the details!🥴
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Small, easily popped bubbles
customer_reviews.text: I like that the sheets can be ripped apart for sizes needed, but the bubbles are so small and easily popped. It really adds no protection for breakables.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Perry

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how to review bubble wrap... it works just like bubble wrap and protects your things!
customer_reviews.author: Otto Weirich

customer_reviews.title: Its bubble wrap
customer_reviews.text: Nice bubble wrap. The precut is very light so it doesnt tear while rapping stuff, but is enough to let you rip it cleanly. Overall heppy with this bubble wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: I'm moving and this bubble wrap worked wonderfully for boxing up kitchen items/glassware
customer_reviews.text: I'm moving and this bubble wrap worked wonderfully for boxing up kitchen items/glassware. The included "FRAGILE" stickers were much appreciated too.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Kaits

customer_reviews.title: Not Usable For Shipping
customer_reviews.text: This product is weak and not usable for the shipping I wanted to accomplish. The plastic is thin and breaks easily.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great price for amount
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the amount! The fragile stickers were a good add item. The bubble wrap worked well it helped me pack up all my stuff, it was easy to use and rip. I would definitely recommend this when moving.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Great size for Home Use
customer_reviews.text: Keep these rolls around for packing or wrapping as needed at home...works great for wrapping my husbands small framed paintings.
customer_reviews.author: akaDopey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for wrapping up dishware for a move, the perforated sheets made it easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bubble Wrap
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for packing to move 1800 miles.Used on the front of computer monitors, glass table tops, and glass picture frames. I wrapped everything I could in this bubble wrap. Protected my items perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly F.

customer_reviews.title: Bubble wrap had partial places to separate pieces. Most ...
customer_reviews.text: Bubble wrap had partial places to separate pieces. Most of it was just one long piece I had to use scissors or rip apart.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bubble wrap worked great on protecting my china from breaking during packing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bubble wrap.
customer_reviews.text: It’s bubble wrap. It tore apart easily. Decent sized sheets. You will run out fast so I would suggest ordering more than you think.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Dee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to cut
customer_reviews.text: worked well for wrapping glasses and similar type items because it was thin enough. Easy to cut. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L. Galway

customer_reviews.title: Well Product - The bubble is good enough
customer_reviews.text: Use it for christmas packing and shipping gifts. Not bad.
customer_reviews.author: MonMon

customer_reviews.title: Not up to par
customer_reviews.text: Squares tear easily and doesn’t hold form well. I have tried several bubble wraps for packaging breakables and this was not one I will buy again 😔
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for moving
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and kept all my items safe & intact during my cross country move.
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: It's bubble wrap...not much else to say
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap and it gets the job done. If you need to ship a lot of fragile stuff, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good value for small bubble wrap
customer_reviews.text: Nice small bubble wrap & appreciate the fragile stickers that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: Very small rolls and the bubbles didn’t protect all my items. The best part was the fragile stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa & Mark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome protection. Easy to get right length.
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Very handy and useful for packing. No damage to any items wrapped in this.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Z

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for packaging! Will definitely be ordering more. The stickers are very useful as well
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Efaw

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you check TOTAL length
customer_reviews.text: Picture makes it look like a lot more. Yes, my fault for not looking at exact demensions. I thought each roll was length said.
customer_reviews.author: marlissa sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but it works and the price is reasonable
customer_reviews.text: For the price it was okay.not double sided bubble wrap and I had to use quite a bit to wrap items up,but it worked for what I needed it to do
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This is not for heavy duty wrapping of fragile items. It is thin with hardly any bubble for protection. I recommend Duck brand. This bubble is clearly overpriced for what you get. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Musolf

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as scheduled, average bubble wrap
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, this bubble wrap was a little flimsy....average at best., on the thin side. It did arrive quickly but I should have ordered a heavier and stronger bubble wrap for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ted T

customer_reviews.title: Already popped bubbles
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the bubbles were already popped and this wasn't effective in packing
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for shipping dead animals
customer_reviews.text: I used this to ship my taxidermy'd dog to my girlfriend and it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Fast response
customer_reviews.text: Did the job very good bubble rap and cuts without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Cryptical

customer_reviews.title: Really appreciate you sending the "Fragile" sticker.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy to use and the "Fragile" sticker is the extra effort that I appreciated and hence writing the review.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Bubble wrap
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bubble wrap to move out of my apartment. It performed like bubble wrap should.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Can buy
customer_reviews.text: Wrap my stuff to jamaica everything wzs ok no brakage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Wrap Rolls for Heavy Packing I am convinced with ...
customer_reviews.text: Best Wrap Rolls for Heavy Packing I am convinced with this wrap rolls because its reusable and easy to use. Worth the price i invested.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah Al Galib

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not a really thick material but its ok for the price
customer_reviews.author: farrah allones

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t wrapped anything with it, but they pop well for stress relief.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Bubble Wrap and Fragile Stickers Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: These are better than no bubble wrap, but the larger bubble type are better for impact when shipping, but for what the product is, decent quality, good price, and the fragile stickers are a big plus for shipping anything breakable to give your buyer more peace of mind that you did as much as you could.
customer_reviews.author: mtbowman
